alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 07 at 9:51PM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast. * WHEN...For the Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast
